ygData.subject: RE: What you are saying isn't exactly right....
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye I know. My Halfling Druid Can make collapsible Fishing pole & it is Trivial to him also. So I guess that means that I have 50 Skill also. I have talked to
ygData.messageBody:
Aye I know. My Halfling Druid Can make collapsible Fishing pole & it is
Trivial to him also. So I guess that means that I have 50 Skill also. I have
talked to a GM, one that I trust, & was told Base 50 for all.

-----Original Message-----
From: Talkum_talmaich@... [mailto:Talkum_talmaich@...]
Sent: Thursday, October 28, 1999 2:40 AM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] What you are saying isn't exactly right....

From: Talkum_talmaich@...

I heard a guy saying that other races couldn't have a base skill of 50
because even gnomes don't until lvl 16...

Well that's not entirely true. My lvl 1 mule gnome made a collapsiable
fishing pole and it was trivial. Does that mean he has a base of 50 or does
a fishing pole take negative 1 skill to make? Hmmm?
